captions.text: Hi guys! Its Brooklyn from BrooklynandBailey, and today I'm here with my little brother,
Daxton, can you say hi? "Hi" and I'm going to be interviewing him today,
You guys commented some questions on Bailey's August favorites video.
and we pulled some of those questions, and I'm going to be asking Daxton today, some of those.
As you guys may not know, I don't know if you guys know this or not,
But Daxton is ADHD, so he is extra special, and he's got a very large personality.
He is very, you know, happy and excited and crazy all the time, huh Dax?
Haha, he is so quiet today, and I'm just going to be asking him some questions,
and he is going to be answering them. So lets get started!
Ok Daxton, our first question, how old are you?
"Five!"
How many is that on your hand? Ok good.
Oh wait are you five? No, no wait he's six! Oh my gosh I can't believe I didn't know that!
Daxton! When is your birthday? "July 23rd" So he is six, he just turned 6 thats why we both forgot.
How many is 6 on your fingers then? No, thats seven! Ok there we go.
Put the thumb in, there we go thats six. "I did that" or you can do the thumb, so thats 6.
Ok, so Daxton now whats your favorite color?
"Green! Dark green!"
Why?
"Because its, its a Christmas color." Oh you like Christmas? Is Christmas your favorite holiday?
"Yeah" Why? "because I get presents" haha from Santa huh? "Yep"
Can you speak Spanish for me? "I only know how to do the numbers" ok say the numbers for me then.
"Uno, Dos, trese, quatro, cinco, ceis, ciete, ocho" what comes next? Nueve? "Nueve" Dies "Dies"
Thats ten huh? "Mhmm"
Well Daxton, do you have a favorite superhero? "Ummm..." thinking? "all of them"
You like all of them? You can't pick a favorite? "No I like all of them" why can't you pick one?
Are they all too good? "I actually like super dog" Ok, he likes super dog.
Ok, Daxton, Whats your favorite thing to do? "Go to places" go to places? "and umm... random places"
random places? Like what? "Cosmic Jump" oh the trampoline place? "Yeah and I also like, um, Jump Street"
Jump street is another one huh? "Yeah, But I  haven't been to it" you haven't gone to it, you just like it? "yeah"
Dax, are you ready for this question? "yeah" ok, who is your favorite sibling?
"Umm... Paisley!" Why? "Because she is crazy" haha and you like crazy? "yeah"
Yup. "So am I" Your, oh yes, yes your crazy, and Paisley is crazy.
"Paisley and me!" why Paisley? "She loves cake!" She loves cake? Your making Paisley a cake because she loves cake?
Awww how nice! "She loves it" really? "yes" do you like cake too? "yes, more then like!"
You like, more then like? "Yes" you love cake? "More then love!" more then love?
"Yup" whats bigger then love? "All of outer space, everything cake" everything? Even outer space cake?
"Yup" wow that is bigger then love Dax, way bigger then love. "Way bigger then a dog"
Ok Dax, if Paisley is your favorite, then who is your least favorite? "Umm... probably, it is Rylan!"
Rylan? Why? She spits on me, she threatens me, she bites me, and she punches me."
Wow that sounds like real siblings!
Why are you so cute? "Because Heavenly Father made me that way"
Awww yeah, Heavenly Father made Daxton cute.
Ok, Dax, what is your favorite toy to play with? "Umm... a remote control, airplane"
"and a remote control superhero, and a remote control car." You like remote control stuff huh?
"Yep" ok "and a remote control TV" a remote control TV? "and a remote control camera that spies on people at night"
Daxton we don't have any of those toys at our house. "I know. I saw them at the store."
And so you want them? "Yep" Oh ok I see. "But Dads to mean, he won't let me have it"
Well maybe for Christmas then. Maybe you can ask Santa Claus for a remote control airplane.
"I can't ask him at night!" Yeah you can ask him for a remote control, what was it? An airplane?
"Yeah, and a remote control camera." Ok you... "and then the remote control car, and remote control super hero"
Ok Dax, whats your favorite food? "cheese burgers!"  Cheese burgers?
How many cheese burgers do you eat when we get cheese burgers? "I usually only eat 10!"
Ten cheese burgers! Yes! "But I get to only eat 2" he would eat ten, but he only gets 2.
Daxton, do you like Frozen? "No" why? "cause!" why? Can you sing frozen? "No"
Yeah sing it! "I do not like the song!" You have to sing Let it go! I will sing it with you!
"No, no, noooooo." Yes! "No!" Let it go! "No! Lalalalalalalala" Let it go! "Nanananannana"
He apparently does not like that song. "No, I do not like Frozen the movie!" Do you like the other disney movies?
"What?" Like tangled? "No! I do not like princess movies!" Do you like super hero movies?
"No!" You don't?! What do you like? "Pokemon movies only!"
Ok Dax, do you have your own room,or do you share a room with somebody?
"Share a room with somebody, that's Paisley." Paisley. Do you like sharing a room with her?
"Yes" why? "She always, always wakes me up." Do you have a bunk bed? "Yes."
Which bunk are you? "Top" and Paisley is bottom? "Yep" oh so you get to jump off every morning.
Dax do you play any sports? "Yes!" What do you play? "Soccor" and? "thats all"
No, you do gymnastics too. "Sports are not gymnastics" Gymnastics is totally a sport Dax!
Because it takes energy to do it. Thats a sport. "Nope! Doesn't take energy for me!"
Because he has too much energy, thats why.
Haha, you can almost reach your head! Auuugghhh! Oh!
You just did like a backflip off the couch. "Yes, I do that every day" Can you do a head stand?
"Um whats a head stand?" Its when you do a handstand on your head.
"without hands?" No with hands Dax.
There you go! Oh so close! Kick harder. There you go. Now your back on your feet.
Are you tired? "No."
What do you want to be when you grow up? "Nothing." You have to be something!
"Dad." You want to be a dad? "Yes." He wants to be a dad. How many kids do you want?
"Umm...18." 18 kids! Wow! Who are you going to marry, do you know who you are going to marry yet?
"No." Nope you don't have a girlfriend or anything? "No." Nope, nope you don't even like girls?
"Nope I don't want to be married." You don't want to be married? "Yup" "And then I get to be free!"
You get to be free? How are you going to have kids? You have to be married to have 18 kids!
"Some of my friends will have to come to my house and live there, and they will not get married,
but then we have kids." Oookkkaaay. "Thats my plan." Sounds like a fun life Dax.
"Mhmm." "And then all the 18 kids will have to do jobs." Oh the 18 kids will have to do chores!
"Nope. Not everyday. Only, not everyday. These are the days they won't have to do them, Saturday,
Friday, and Sunday." Ok and the rest of the week they will have to do chores?
"On August they don't have chores." in August? "And then on January they have chores,
like on January, then February, and all these days, and like, August, then January,
then all the ones that are in that, they have to do chores."
"And then these ones, they don't do chores, none of us, and then these ones they have to do chores,
these ones, they have to do chores, and this month they don't, and this month they don't."
Ok. So they sometimes have to do chores, and sometimes they don't?
"And then sometimes we take away their chores." Sometimes they go away?
"No, they take.." you take the chores away? "Yup" Oh ok. "And then they get to all play, Every single day."
they just play, play, play? "Yup" with their friends all day long? "Yep." Oh that sounds fun.
"And then they get to have sleepovers." Oh that sounds fun. "But I make pull them away, and may get my remote control camera."
Ok. "And then spy on them." Your going to spy on the with your remote control camera?
"Yup, everytime." Woah, your kids better be prepared. "Nope, with my remote control camera."
Ok. "I don't control it." You don't control it? Its remote control! "Nope, its trained."
Its trained? The camera is trained to spy on its own. "Yes." "And it can't be destroyed."
Oh its indestructible? "No it can't be destroyed." Ok. "Its as hard as a sword."
"Actually its as hard as something that can kill with one second." "I mean one, one good kill."
So, so this camera is indestructible, and its as hard as a sword that can kill you in one second?
"No, one hit" One hit? "Its an emerald sword, because it can't be..." and emerald sword?
Whats an emerald sword? "An emerald is um, something that um, cannot break."
Oh. "But you can like use a pick axe, and then break it when its like, in the block."
Ok. "But you can't break it when it is made out of something."
Ok Dax, make your funniest face possible ever. "Gaahhhhh"
Ready? "Mellllaaaahhhh" whats yours Dax? "Mleaaahhh"
"Um" do you see any questions we missed? Oh cheese or pepperoni pizza? We missed that one.
Do you like cheese or pepperoni? "And who is your BFF?" No I asked that one!
"No!" Who is your BFF? "I don't know what a BFF is." Best friend forever.
"Um, you only asked me best friend, not best friend forever." Ok who is your best friend forever?
"Um, Ethan! I mean, who was it?" Did you say Paisley? "Um, oh yeah I did say Paisley."
Well is she your best friend? Are you going to protect her when she is older?
Are you going to beat up all those bad guys that want to date her?
"No." No, your going to be nice? "Yeah"
Well thank you guys so much for watching my interview with Daxton, Daxton do you have anything you want to say?
"Yes." What? "I hope you see me on meet my brother!" He hopes you watch this video, and what should we have them comment?
Comment below on your favorite question and answer that Daxton gave.
"You should comment um, who is your favorite, because I know it will be me Daxton!"
Who is your favorite, comment who is your favorite from the CGH family? Yeah?
"And I know it will be Daxton." And he knows your all going to comment Daxton, he is watching those comments.
So give a thumbs up if you liked this video. Be sure to subscribe, and we will see you guys next week!
Bye! "And I will also watch the comments." He is watching the comments, so make sure you comment Daxton.
"Or else you're going to be disqualified." Oh your disqualified. "From the challenge, its a challenge."
Its a challenge! Ok! Bye guys! "Bye, Bye!"

title: Meet My Little Brother | Brooklyn and Bailey
